title: Love Island's Francesca Allen gets cosy with new tattooed boyfriend in Abu Dhabi
text:

Love Island's Francesca Allen has gone public with her new beau on Instagram .

The reality star unveiled the identity of her new love as tattooed business analyst Paul Hutchie on Instagram on Tuesday.

In the snap, the Love Island star and her dishy man were stylishly in sync in matching sapphire blue swimming costumes.

They looked at each other lovingly while the new couple cosied up on the golden sands in the sun-scorched setting of Abu Dhabi.

Francesca sizzled in a blue plunging one-piece which hugged every inch of her fantastic curves.

(Image: Instagram)

Paul showcased his extensive inkings across his chest and up his legs while he posed in a blue pair of swimming trunks.

He commented beneath the photograph in a playful fashion: "So glad we planned the blue ay wife."

Francesca opened up about her romance life with 471K followers on Instagram.

(Image: Instagram)

She wrote in the caption: "Instagram couple goals." Francesca added the blue heart emoji and a crying laughing face.

Francesca had also been on holiday with her Love Island girlfriend Joanna Chimonides.

The Mirror has approached Francesca Allen's representatives for further comment.

(Image: ITV/REX)

(Image: francesca_allen/Instagram)

Francesca failed to find a long-lasting romance when she made it into the Love Island villa as a late arrival.

The brunette bombshell did partner up with firefighter Michael Griffiths in the recoupling.

Francesca got everyone giggling when she talked about how she had no choice but to partner up with Michael after his ex Amber Gill chose to move on with Greg O'Shea.

However, she and Michael became good friends in the days they spent together before they were booted out of the villa.

Despite being on Love Island for such a short time, she made quite an impact on the villa with her kind heart and cheeky sense of humour.

The beauty made friends for life with many of the girls and has continued to keep up friendships with them.
description: Love Island's Francesca has flaunted her new romance with business analyst Paul as they hit the beach in Abu Dhabi
